name: Slow Cooker Chicken Stroganoff
author: JUDI ANN
summary: Cubed chicken breast cooked in the slow cooker with a simple, creamy sauce mixture. This is so good, and so easy to make on a busy day. Serve over hot cooked rice, if desired.
ingredients: 4  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed
1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Put chicken, margarine and dressing mix in slow cooker; mix together and cook on low for 5 to 6 hours
Add cream cheese and soup, mix together and cook on high for another 1/2 hour or until heated through and warm
